attributes.action: Stop insurance companies quoting us ridiculous prices.
attributes.additional_details: I want this because it’s totally unfair for people who have the money to buy a new car for themselves and you can’t even get insured on them, let the public enjoy, we all have 1 life and 1 life only so why not allow people who have the money to buy the car be quoted fair prices! For me I’m being quoted 30k for a bmw 120 m sport 2015 with a years driving experience and 1 years no claim bonus.
attributes.background: I want the government to end greedy insurance companies quoting us like £20,000-£30,000 for a quote on a car. I’ve been quoted 30k for a bmw 120i m sport 2015.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: 

Stop individuals in non-fault accidents being charged more for car insurance: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639425

Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636551

Alternatively, you could start a petition calling on the Government to remove the requirement for motorists to be insured, if that's something they might like to happen.
